titles.title: Shenandoah Parcel 7387 No Surface Occupancy Act of 2018
To prohibit surface occupancy for purposes of mineral leasing or development on certain land located in Plata County, Colorado, and for other purposes.
Shenandoah Parcel 7387 No Surface Occupancy Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

bill.summary:
Shenandoah Parcel 7387 No Surface Occupancy Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of the Interior to prohibit surface occupancy on and surface disturbance of certain land located in La Plata County, Colorado, for purposes of mineral leasing or development.
